directoryOverview: Business layer for continuing medical education courses, events, evaluations, and credit certificates.

files.summary: Data transfer object holding assignment state for a CME evaluation assigned to a user, including completion and verification dates.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a single CME evaluation assignment record with completion, verification, and soft-delete flags.

files.summary: Stub manager class with no implemented methods, acting as a placeholder for CME assignment operations.
files.businessPurpose: Reserved entry point for CME assignment management logic; currently unimplemented.

files.summary: Handles CME conference banner image upload, resizing to 600x285, and saving to the server DeptImages directory.
files.businessPurpose: Provides image upload and resize logic for CME conference banners displayed on scheduling pages.
keyMethods: SaveCMEConferenceBanner - uploads and saves a banner image after resizing
resizeImageAndSave - resizes image to 600x285 using high-quality bicubic interpolation

files.summary: Orchestrates multi-topic CME evaluation view initialization, calculates total claimed credits, and validates completion state for final submission.
files.businessPurpose: Controls CME evaluation completion workflow including credit aggregation, graded-out topic handling, and submission eligibility checks.
keyMethods: OnViewInitializeEvaluateCMEEvaluation - binds repeater and computes claimed credits for a schedule+evaluation pair
GetTotalClaimedCredits - sums credits across completed topics, tracks pending/graded-out topics, validates submission readiness
IsNumaric - numeric string validation helper
IsDecimal - decimal string validation helper

files.summary: Data object holding certificate template configuration including logo, dual signature blocks, descriptors, headings, and credit category.
files.businessPurpose: Stores all fields required to render a department-branded CME credit certificate.

files.summary: Data object storing connectivity credentials for external integrations including satellite programs and payment processors (Authorize.Net, Clover, Square).
files.businessPurpose: Holds department-level credentials for CME satellite program connectivity and merchant payment gateway configuration.

files.summary: Manages persistence and retrieval of CME external connectivity settings for satellite programs and payment gateway merchant services.
files.businessPurpose: Saves and loads department connectivity credentials for CME satellite programs and payment providers (Authorize.Net, Clover, Square).
keyMethods: GetConnectivityNamesForDepartment - lists available connectivity category names
SaveDepartmentConnectivityInfo - saves satellite program credentials
GetDepartmentConnectivityInfo - retrieves saved connectivity info
GetCMESatellitePrograms - lists satellite program departments
SaveSatelliteProgramDepartments - saves satellite program department list
GetMerchantServiceNames - lists payment gateway options
GetSavedMerchantServiceInfo - retrieves saved merchant gateway config
SaveMerchantServiceInfo - saves Authorize.Net/Clover/Square credentials
GetSavedMerchantServiceInfoforpayments - retrieves merchant info as DataTable for payment processing

files.summary: Data object holding department CME credentialing text including acknowledgment, disclosure, accreditation statement, and credit statement.
files.businessPurpose: Stores regulatory compliance text fields displayed on CME evaluation forms and certificates.

files.summary: Manages saving and retrieval of department CME credentialing statements and maximum event credit limits.
files.businessPurpose: Persists accreditation statements, disclosures, and credit limits used in CME evaluations and certificate generation.
keyMethods: Save - upserts credential info via ManageCMECredentialingInformation SP and raises business event
GetCredentialInfoByDepartment - fetches credential text for the logged-in department
FetchCredentialInfo - maps DataTable row to CMECredentialInfo object
GeCMEMaxEventCredits(eventid) - returns max credits for a specific event
GeCMEMaxEventCredits() - returns default max credits for the department

files.summary: Orchestrates CME financial statement report generation by populating WebForms page controls with event/speaker filtered data across a date range.
files.businessPurpose: Bridges WebForms page controls with CMEFinancialManager to populate financial statement and results reports by event or speaker.
keyMethods: OnViewInitializeGetCMEFinancialStatementReport - loads event or speaker list into page list boxes
GetCMEFinancialStatementReport - returns financial report DataSet filtered by events or speakers
GetCMEFinancialStatementResultsReport - returns detailed results report DataSet
GetCMEFinancialReport - populates page controls with report data
PrepareIDList - converts ListBox items to comma-delimited ID string
GetFilteredEvents - filters events to current department if applicable

files.summary: Provides data access and report rendering utilities for CME financial reports including summary, results, and HTML print output methods.
files.businessPurpose: Retrieves CME financial data by event or speaker and renders printable HTML report headers and footers.
keyMethods: GetCMEFinancialReport - fetches CME financial summary by event or speaker with date range
GetAcedamicYearStartDate - returns current academic year start date
GetFavouriteReportSettingsinfoByID - retrieves saved report settings
GetCMEFinancialResultsReport - fetches detailed financial results report
GetReportInputInfo - builds ReportInfo from HTTP request parameters
PrintReportHTMLHeader - writes HTML head section with CSS/JS to response
PrintReportFooter - writes footer and HideWait script to response
StartHTML/EndHTML/StartBODY/EndBODY - HTTP response HTML structure helpers

files.summary: Manages CRUD operations for CME certificate templates including logo, signatures, descriptors, and heading fields with cache invalidation.
files.businessPurpose: Provides full lifecycle management for department certificate templates used to generate printed CME credit certificates.
keyMethods: GetCertificateList - returns typed list of all department certificates
GetCertificates - returns DataTable with cache-aside pattern
GetCertificateInfoByID - fetches single certificate by ID
GetCertificateInfoByDepartment - fetches active department certificate
GetCertificatesForLookup - returns certificates for dropdown population
Save - inserts certificate and raises business event
FetchCertificateInfo/FetchCertificateList - DataTable-to-object mapping helpers

files.summary: Empty stub class with no properties or methods.
files.businessPurpose: Placeholder for CME event info model; no functionality implemented.

files.summary: Empty stub manager class with no implemented methods.
files.businessPurpose: Placeholder for CME event management; no functionality implemented.

files.summary: Data object representing a course handout file attachment with path, filename, and change-tracking flags for CRUD operations.
files.businessPurpose: Tracks the state of handout documents attached to a CME course for transactional insert/update/delete processing.

files.summary: Data object representing a CME online course including metadata, linked event/template/quiz, and child collections for speakers, objectives, videos, and handouts.
files.businessPurpose: Aggregates all data required to create or edit a CME self-study course with associated lecturers, learning objectives, and content files.

files.summary: Manages creation and update of CME courses using transactional batch execution of stored procedures for the course and all child entities.
files.businessPurpose: Persists CME course records along with lecturers, learning objectives, handouts, and videos in a single atomic database transaction.
keyMethods: AddCourse - inserts course and all child records in one transaction via AddCMECourse SP
UpdateCourse - updates course and delta-processes child collections (add/delete for lecturers/objectives/handouts/videos)

files.summary: Data object representing a video attached to a CME course with path, filename, and change-tracking flags.
files.businessPurpose: Tracks the state of video files attached to a CME course for transactional insert/update/delete processing.

files.summary: Data object for a CME credit type record including description, dual activity director/signature fields, and accreditation statement.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a department-defined CME credit category with its associated director signatures used on credit certificates.

files.summary: Provides full CRUD operations for CME credit types with cache-aside pattern for list retrieval and business event raising on changes.
files.businessPurpose: Manages CME credit type lifecycle including creation, update, soft-delete, and GUID-based signature image naming.
keyMethods: GetCreditTypesList - returns typed list using cache-aside
GetCreditTypes - returns DataTable with cache-aside
GetCreditTypesForLookup - returns simplified list for dropdowns
GetCreditTypeInfoByID - fetches single credit type
Save - inserts credit type and raises business event
Update - updates credit type and invalidates cache
Delete - soft-deletes credit type
GenerateSignatureImageName - generates GUID for signature image filename

files.summary: Manages retrieval and saving of CME email distribution lists used for scheduling conference notification emails.
files.businessPurpose: Provides data access for CME email database lists enabling administrators to schedule bulk email notifications to attendees.
keyMethods: GetEmailDBList - retrieves active email lists by criteria
GetDeletedEmailDBList - retrieves deleted email lists
GetSelectedEmailList - retrieves a specific email list by ID and event
Save - saves a scheduled email list for a CME event

files.summary: Rich aggregate data object for a completed CME evaluation including credits, MOC fields, answers, barriers, learning objectives, quiz info, and topic credits.
files.businessPurpose: Represents the full state of a user's CME evaluation submission including all answer data needed for reporting and credit calculation.

files.summary: Core CME evaluation manager handling retrieval, submission, and multi-topic data mapping including answers, quiz status, learning objectives, and barrier responses.
files.businessPurpose: Orchestrates all CME evaluation data access operations from pending evaluation lists through full submission with quiz and MOC credit tracking.
keyMethods: GetEvalauationsToComplete - lists pending CME evaluations for current user
GetCmeEvaluationInfoByID - loads full evaluation aggregate from 8-table DataSet
SubmitEvaluation - persists completed evaluation in add or edit mode
FetchEvaluationInfo - maps multi-table DataSet to EvaluationInfo aggregate
FetchEvaluationAnswers - maps evaluation answers from DataTable
FetchBarrierEvaluationAnswers - maps barrier question answers
FetchEvaluationLearningObjectives - maps learning objective responses
FetchCMEQuizInfoAnswers - maps CME quiz attempt info
GetCMEMultiTopics - retrieves multi-topic schedule data

files.summary: Search filter object for CME evaluation queries supporting user, admin, event, schedule, sort, and academic year parameters.
files.businessPurpose: Carries filter parameters for evaluation list queries including event type and academic year filtering.

files.summary: Large report manager providing HTTP response-based HTML print output, answer lookups, and report parameter parsing for CME evaluation reports.
files.businessPurpose: Generates printable CME evaluation reports by rendering HTML directly to the HTTP response stream with configurable filters and scoring options.
keyMethods: GetReportInputInfo / GetReportInputInfo(name) - builds ReportInfo from HTTP request params
GetAnswersByAnswerType - fetches answer options for a given answer type
StartHTML/EndHTML/StartBODY/StartBODYWithBG - response HTML scaffolding methods
PrintReportHTMLHeader - writes full HTML head with CSS and JS includes
PrintReportFooter - writes report footer HTML to response

files.summary: Rich aggregate data object for a CME event including credit type, ACCME activity/outcome fields, financial income/expense fields, learning objectives, and schedule info.
files.businessPurpose: Represents the full configuration of a CME event including ACCME compliance data, financial tracking fields, and associated schedules.

files.summary: Manages CME event lifecycle including list retrieval with search criteria, full event detail loading, creation with child objects, update, and delete operations.
files.businessPurpose: Provides comprehensive data access for CME events including ACCME activity type data, financial fields, learning objectives, and support sources.
keyMethods: GetEventList - retrieves all events using default criteria
GetEventListBySearchCriteria - searches events by name/creator/department
GetEventInfoByID - loads full event aggregate from 3-table DataSet
GetEventListByCriteriaForReports - filtered event list for report selectors
GetEventListByCriteriaForSummaryEventReport - event list for summary reports
FetchEventInfo - maps multi-table DataSet to EventInfo
FetchMasterEventInfo - maps all scalar event fields
FetchEventLearningObjectives - maps event learning objectives
FetchEventSupportSources - maps commercial support sources

files.summary: Simple search filter object for CME event list queries with department, name, and creator filters.
files.businessPurpose: Carries optional filter parameters for CME event list queries.

files.summary: Serializable data object for a CME guest presenter with name, title, suffix fields, and first/last name validation.
files.businessPurpose: Represents an external guest speaker who is not a system user but can be assigned as a CME event presenter.
keyMethods: Validate - checks that first and last name are non-empty

files.summary: Manages save, update, and retrieval of CME guest presenter records.
files.businessPurpose: Persists external guest presenter information for CME events where the presenter is not a registered system user.
keyMethods: Save - inserts guest presenter record via AddCMEGuestPresenters SP
Update - updates guest presenter via UpdateCMEGuestPresenters SP
GetScheduleGuestInfoByID - fetches guest info by schedule guest ID
FetchCMEGuestInfo - maps DataTable row to GuestInfo object

files.summary: Serializable data object for a CME learning objective with answer type/scale, marginal values, individual evaluation flag, and change-tracking state.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a single learning objective attached to an event or schedule template, used to assess learner achievement.

files.summary: Empty stub class with no implemented methods.
files.businessPurpose: Placeholder for learning objective management; no functionality implemented.

files.summary: Serializable data object for a CME event lecturer (internal user or guest) with change-tracking flags for transactional delta processing.
files.businessPurpose: Tracks a presenter assignment to a CME schedule or course with new/deleted/updated state for batch CRUD operations.

files.summary: Data object for a CME question record with category, description, retire flag, and comment box requirement.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a reusable CME evaluation question that can be categorized and retired.

files.summary: Provides lookup data retrieval for CME audience types and question categories used in evaluation question filtering.
files.businessPurpose: Supplies reference data for CME question categorization by audience and category lookups.
keyMethods: GetCMEAdience - retrieves CME audience list
GetCMEQuestionCategories - retrieves question categories filtered by audience ID

files.summary: Data object for CME event registration capturing attendee personal info, billing address, payment card details, attendance type, and registration status.
files.businessPurpose: Represents the full registration record for a user signing up for a CME event including payment processing fields.

files.summary: Large serializable aggregate data object for a CME conference schedule instance including dates, credits, registration settings, ACCME fields, financial fields, and child collections for lecturers, objectives, and support sources.
files.businessPurpose: Represents the complete configuration of a scheduled CME conference occurrence including all metadata required for registration, evaluation, and ACCME reporting.

files.summary: Core schedule manager persisting CME conference schedules with all child data including topics, lecturers, learning objectives, and commercial support sources in transactional batches.
files.businessPurpose: Creates and updates CME schedule instances with full ACCME compliance data, registration configuration, and financial tracking in a single atomic operation.
keyMethods: ScheduleTemplate - creates a new schedule via CreateSchedule SP with all child objects
UpdateSchedule - updates existing schedule and delta-processes child collections
GetScheduleList - retrieves schedule list for event
GetScheduleInfoByID - loads full schedule aggregate

files.summary: Serializable data object for a CME commercial support source entry tracking monetary and in-kind support with change-tracking flags.
files.businessPurpose: Records ACCME-required commercial support disclosures including source name, monetary amount, and in-kind support categories.

files.summary: Serializable data object for a CME evaluation template with name, comment/barrier/conflict settings, questions list, answer type/scale, and validation against duplicate names.
files.businessPurpose: Represents a reusable CME evaluation form template with configurable sections for conflicts, barriers, and competency improvement.
keyMethods: Validate(validationMessages, pageMode) - checks name required and uniqueness for template
Validate(validationMessages) - checks name required and uniqueness for conference

files.summary: Manages the full lifecycle of CME evaluation templates including CRUD, duplicate name checks, question list management, publishing, and conference template operations.
files.businessPurpose: Controls CME evaluation template creation, editing, publishing, deletion, and question assignment with cache management and business event raising.
keyMethods: DoesTemplateNameExists - validates template name uniqueness
DoseConferenceNameExist - validates conference template name uniqueness
GetTemplateList / GetDeleteTemplateList - retrieves active/deleted template lists
GetTemplateInfoByID - loads full template with questions from 2-table DataSet
FetchTemplateInfo - maps DataSet to TemplateInfo aggregate
FetchTemplateQuestionList - maps question rows to TemplateQuestionInfo list
Save - inserts template
Update - updates template
GetCMETemplateListForSummaryEventReport - filtered list for report context

files.summary: Combined data/business class for managing named email distribution lists uploaded via CSV, including validation, duplicate checking, and bulk insert via SqlBulkCopy.
files.businessPurpose: Allows administrators to upload named attendee email lists for CME event email scheduling, with duplicate name validation.
keyMethods: Validate - checks name required and uniqueness for the upload list
DoesUploadNameExists - SP-backed duplicate name check
Save(tbl, uploadInfo) - bulk-inserts upload list rows via AddUploadEmailDBList SP and SqlBulkCopy
ConvertToInteger - local DBNull-safe integer conversion helper
